00022 
00023 /* this comes from the `reuse' library. copy any changes back to the source */
00024 
00025 #ifndef _ODE_MEMORY_H_
00026 #define _ODE_MEMORY_H_
00027 
00028 #include "ode/config.h"
00029 
00030 #ifdef __cplusplus
00031 extern "C" {
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 /* function types to allocate and free memory */
00035 typedef void * dAllocFunction (size_t size);
00036 typedef void * dReallocFunction (void *ptr, size_t oldsize, size_t newsize);
00037 typedef void dFreeFunction (void *ptr, size_t size);
00038 
00039 /* set new memory management functions. if fn is 0, the default handlers are
00040  * used. */
00041 void dSetAllocHandler (dAllocFunction *fn);
00042 void dSetReallocHandler (dReallocFunction *fn);
00043 void dSetFreeHandler (dFreeFunction *fn);
00044 
00045 /* get current memory management functions */
00046 dAllocFunction *dGetAllocHandler ();
00047 dReallocFunction *dGetReallocHandler ();
00048 dFreeFunction *dGetFreeHandler ();
00049 
00050 /* enable debug memory allocation on Visual C++ _DEBUG */
00051 #if _MSC_VER > 1000
00052 #ifdef _DEBUG
00053 #include <crtdbg.h>
00054 #define dUSE_DEBUG_MALLOC
00055 #endif // _DEBUG
00056 #endif // _MSC_VER > 1000
00057 
00058 /* allocate and free memory. */
00059 #ifndef dUSE_DEBUG_MALLOC
00060 
00061     void * dAlloc (size_t size);
00062     void * dRealloc (void *ptr, size_t oldsize, size_t newsize);
00063     void dFree (void *ptr, size_t size);
00064 
00065 #else // dUSE_DEBUG_MALLOC
00066 
00067     void * dAlloc_dbg (size_t size, const char* filename, int line );
00068     void * dRealloc_dbg (void *ptr, size_t oldsize, size_t newsize, const char* filename, int line );
00069     void dFree_dbg (void *ptr, size_t size, const char* filename, int line );
00070 
00071     #define dAlloc(SIZE) dAlloc_dbg( (SIZE), __FILE__, __LINE__ )
00072     #define dRealloc(PTR, OLDSIZE, NEWSIZE) dRealloc_dbg( (PTR), (OLDSIZE), (NEWSIZE), __FILE__, __LINE__ )
00073     #define dFree(PTR, SIZE) dFree_dbg( (PTR), (SIZE), __FILE__, __LINE__ )
00074 
00075 #endif // dUSE_DEBUG_MALLOC
00076 
00077 #ifdef __cplusplus
00078 }
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 #endif
